    • Method Detail

      • notifyRun

        public void notifyRun(PlayerColor playerColor,
                      java.lang.String playerName,
                      int newSquare)
        Notifies all players that the current player has used the Run action and tells them where he moved.
        Parameters:
        playerColor - of the player that run.
        playerName - of the player that run.
        newSquare - position of the player.

      • notifyTeleporter

        public void notifyTeleporter(PlayerColor playerColor,
                             java.lang.String playerName,
                             java.lang.String newSquare)
        Notifies all players that the current player has used the teleporter and tells them where he moved.
        Parameters:
        playerColor - of the player that teleported.
        playerName - of the player that teleported.
        newSquare - position of the player that teleported.

      • notifyNewton

        public void notifyNewton(java.lang.String playerName,
                         java.lang.String opponentName,
                         PlayerColor playerColor,
                         PlayerColor opponentColor,
                         int newSquare)
        Notifies all players that the current player has used the Newton powerUp also telling them how it was used.
        Parameters:
        playerName - of the player that used the Newton.
        opponentName - of the target of the Newton.
        playerColor - of the player that used the Newton.
        opponentColor - of the target of the Newton.
        newSquare - position of the target that has been moved.

      • notifyDrawPowerUp

        public void notifyDrawPowerUp(PlayerColor playerColor,
                              java.lang.String playerName,
                              java.lang.String powerUpList,
                              int num)
        Notifies all players that the current player has drawn a number of powerUp.
        Parameters:
        playerColor - of the player that drew the PowerUp.
        playerName - of the player that drew the PowerUp.
        powerUpList - list of PowerUp drawn (shown to the player that drew them).
        num - the number of PowerUp drawn (shown to the other players).

      • notifyDrawAmmo

        public void notifyDrawAmmo(PlayerColor playerColor,
                           java.lang.String playerName,
                           java.lang.String ammo)
        Notifies the players that the current player drew ammo from a square and shows what ammo he picked up.
        Parameters:
        playerColor - of the player that drew the ammo.
        playerName - of the player that drew the ammo.
        ammo - picked up by the player.

      • notifyShoot

        public void notifyShoot(Player currentPlayer,
                        java.util.ArrayList<Player> targets,
                        java.util.ArrayList<Player> allPlayers)
        Notifies all players that the Shoot Action is ended and sends them the list of damage the players have received.
        Parameters:
        currentPlayer - player that shoot.
        targets - hit by the player.
        allPlayers - list of all the player (used to send the correct messages to the hit players).

      • notifyGeneric

        public void notifyGeneric(java.lang.String message)
        Notifies a message to all the player.
        Parameters:
        message - to be notified.

      • notifyPlayer

        public void notifyPlayer(java.lang.String message,
                         PlayerColor playerColor)
        Notifies a message to the given player.
        Parameters:
        message - to be notified.
        playerColor - of the player to be notified.

      • notifyOtherPlayers

        public void notifyOtherPlayers(java.lang.String message,
                               PlayerColor playerColor)
        Notifies a message to all but the chosen player.
        Parameters:
        message - to be notified.
        playerColor - of the player not to be notified.

      • notifyGrenade

        public void notifyGrenade(PlayerColor user,
                          PlayerColor victim)
        Notifies all players that a TagBack grenade was used and how it was used.
        Parameters:
        user - of the grenade.
        victim - of the grenade.

      • notifyMessages

        public void notifyMessages(PlayerColor playerColor,
                           java.lang.String toPlayer,
                           java.lang.String toOthers)
        Notifies a message to a player and another message to the others.
        Parameters:
        playerColor - of the player that receives the first message.
        toPlayer - to be sent to the player.
        toOthers - to be sent to the other players.
